conbody.p: The Relations tab gives information on the relation between the objects. The default setting is the relationship between the selected object and its parent object ("Part of").
Choose an option from the drop-down menu:

ul.li: Partof: Your current item is a part (child) of another item.

conbody.p: The last three options are offered but are not relevant for the Text Corpus at the moment.
Object: Enter the Name of the related object here.
Search Object: Search for the object in the corpora of your current project, so that you do not have to enter it manually. The search may take a few seconds until the results are displayed.
Add Relation: Click it to add more relations between yours and other items.
Remove Widget: This removes a relation from the object.
